Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand's coach Gary Stead mentioned that Kane Williamson is ruled out due to a hamstring injury and Tim Seifert is expected to replace him.
New Zealand is a win away from winning the series, while Pakistan is fighting to keep the series alive.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is played at University Oval in Dunedin, which is traditionally batting-friendly.
The match starts at 5:30 AM IST.
